author: fabiocos
body:
#### PR description:

- remove useless ```GeometricTimingDet``` header in digitization and local reconstruction code;

- avoid copy in range based loops inside ```MTDGeometry``` following #29002 (but no big gain expected)

#### PR validation:

The test code in ```Geometry/MTDGeometryBuilder``` provides unchanged description of scenario D50.
title: MTD Reco geometry: minor technical cleaning
